001-68652.docx.content: FOR THESE REASONS, THE COURT UNANIMOUSLY

elements.content: Holds that there has been a violation of Article 10 of the Convention.
Done in English, and notified in writing on 29 March 2005, pursuant to Rule 77 §§ 2 and 3 of the Rules of Court.

issue: Article 28 of the Constitution (as in force in 1997)
Section 86 of the Code on Criminal Procedure
